item.description: We’re joining the Southeastern CT Singles Assoc. for a fun day and lunch on the island.  We’ll meet in New London at 10:15 am for high-speed ferry, round trip ticket $43.  For info, call Sylvia 860-444-0400.  Rain date Thursday, July 14.  Directions to 2 Ferry Street:  I-95N to Exit 83 (New London,  Waterfront District), ramp end go straight onto Huntington Street, at 3rd light turn left onto Gov. Winthrop Blvd., go straight over RR tracks and bear right into ferry entrance.  You can park there or at Ramada Inn and walk down.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be near the ticket booth.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Block Island Day Trip
